mapper.select:
select product.Id product_id, product.BasicProductId product_basicProductId, product.SpvId product_spvId, product.CategoryId product_categoryId, product.AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, product.Name product_name, product.Code product_code, product.TotalAmount product_totalAmount, product.SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, product.FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, product.UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, product.Description product_description, product.Status product_status, product.DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, product.CreatorId product_creatorId, product.CreateTime product_createTime, product.ModifierId product_modifierId, product.ModifyTime product_modifyTime, product.IsDelete product_isDelete, product.Sort product_sort, product.ViewName product_viewName, basicProduct.Id basicProduct_id, basicProduct.SpvId basicProduct_spvId, basicProduct.Name basicProduct_name, basicProduct.Code basicProduct_code, basicProduct.TotalAmount basicProduct_totalAmount, basicProduct.InterestRateDate basicProduct_interestRateDate, basicProduct.ProfitExpirationDate basicProduct_profitExpirationDate, basicProduct.ActualExpirationDate basicProduct_actualExpirationDate, basicProduct.PaymentDate basicProduct_paymentDate, basicProduct.ActualPaymentDate basicProduct_actualPaymentDate, basicProduct.ExpectedProfitRatio basicProduct_expectedProfitRatio, basicProduct.ActualExpectedProfitRatio basicProduct_actualExpectedProfitRatio, basicProduct.ExpectedProfit basicProduct_expectedProfit, basicProduct.ActualProfit basicProduct_actualProfit, basicProduct.Description basicProduct_description, basicProduct.CreateTime basicProduct_createTime, basicProduct.ModifierId basicProduct_modifierId, basicProduct.ModifyTime basicProduct_modifyTime, basicProduct.isDelete basicProduct_isDelete, basicProduct.CreatorId basicProduct_creatorId, assetCategory.Id assetCategory_id, assetCategory.Code assetCategory_code, assetCategory.Name assetCategory_name, assetCategory.Type assetCategory_type, assetCategory.RateOfReturn assetCategory_rateOfReturn, assetCategory.Variance assetCategory_variance, assetCategory.Rate assetCategory_rate, assetCategory.Description assetCategory_description, assetCategory.CreateTime assetCategory_createTime, assetCategory.ModifyTime assetCategory_modifyTime from PC_Product product inner join PC_BasicProduct basicProduct on basicProduct.Id=product.BasicProductId inner join AA_AssetCategory assetCategory on assetCategory.Id=product.AssetCategoryCode
and Id=${id} and BasicProductId=${basicProductId} and SpvId=${spvId} and CategoryId=${categoryId} and AssetCategoryCode=#{assetCategoryCode} and Name=#{name} and Code=#{code} and TotalAmount=${totalAmount} and SurplusAmount=${surplusAmount} and FirstPublishTime=#{firstPublishTime} and UmpayAccountNo=#{umpayAccountNo} and Description=#{description} and Status=${status} and DistributeStatus=${distributeStatus} and CreatorId=${creatorId} and CreateTime=#{createTime} and ModifierId=${modifierId} and ModifyTime=#{modifyTime} and IsDelete=${isDelete} and Sort=${sort} and ViewName=#{viewName}

platformServiceFee.SpvId platformServiceFee_spvId, platformServiceFee.ProductId platformServiceFee_productId, platformServiceFee.ReturnMoneyId platformServiceFee_returnMoneyId, platformServiceFee.SpvLoanId platformServiceFee_spvLoanId, platformServiceFee.TradeNumber platformServiceFee_tradeNumber, platformServiceFee.PayPlantformNumber platformServiceFee_payPlantformNumber, platformServiceFee.PrincipalAmount platformServiceFee_principalAmount, platformServiceFee.ServiceFee platformServiceFee_serviceFee, platformServiceFee.ServiceFeeRatio platformServiceFee_takeFinishTime, platformServiceFee.CheckingTime platformServiceFee_checkingTime, platformServiceFee.CheckingStatus platformServiceFee_checkingStatus, platformServiceFee.Remark platformServiceFee_remark from PC_Product product inner join PC_ProductAttributeConfig productAttributeConfig on productAttributeConfig.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_ProductAmountLock productAmountLock on productAmountLock.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_SpvAccountingDetail spvAccountingDetail on spvAccountingDetail.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_AccountingDetail accountingDetail on accountingDetail.ProductId=product.Id inner join PC_ProductContract productContract on productContract.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_ProductReturnMoney productReturnMoney on productReturnMoney.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_Subscription subscription on subscription.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_Appointment appointment on appointment.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_SpvProductReturnMoney spvProductReturnMoney on spvProductReturnMoney.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_Loan loan on loan.ProductId=product.Id inner join PC_SubProduct subProduct on subProduct.ProductId=product.Id inner join TC_PlatformServiceFee platformServiceFee on platformServiceFee.ProductId=product.Id
and Id=${id} and BasicProductId=${basicProductId} and SpvId=${spvId} and CategoryId=${categoryId} and AssetCategoryCode=#{assetCategoryCode} and Name=#{name} and Code=#{code} and TotalAmount=${totalAmount} and SurplusAmount=${surplusAmount} and FirstPublishTime=#{firstPublishTime} and UmpayAccountNo=#{umpayAccountNo} and Description=#{description} and Status=${status} and DistributeStatus=${distributeStatus} and CreatorId=${creatorId} and CreateTime=#{createTime} and ModifierId=${modifierId} and ModifyTime=#{modifyTime} and IsDelete=${isDelete} and Sort=${sort} and ViewName=#{viewName}

and Id=${id} and BasicProductId=${basicProductId} and SpvId=${spvId} and CategoryId=${categoryId} and AssetCategoryCode=#{assetCategoryCode} and Name=#{name} and Code=#{code} and TotalAmount=${totalAmount} and SurplusAmount=${surplusAmount} and FirstPublishTime=#{firstPublishTime} and UmpayAccountNo=#{umpayAccountNo} and Description=#{description} and Status=${status} and DistributeStatus=${distributeStatus} and CreatorId=${creatorId} and CreateTime=#{createTime} and ModifierId=${modifierId} and ModifyTime=#{modifyTime} and IsDelete=${isDelete} and Sort=${sort} and ViewName=#{viewName}

select Id product_id, BasicProductId product_basicProductId, SpvId product_spvId, CategoryId product_categoryId, AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, Name product_name, Code product_code, TotalAmount product_totalAmount, SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, Description product_description, Status product_status, DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, CreatorId product_creatorId, CreateTime product_createTime, ModifierId product_modifierId, ModifyTime product_modifyTime, IsDelete product_isDelete, Sort product_sort, ViewName product_viewName from PC_Product

select Id product_id, BasicProductId product_basicProductId, SpvId product_spvId, CategoryId product_categoryId, AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, Name product_name, Code product_code, TotalAmount product_totalAmount, SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, Description product_description, Status product_status, DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, CreatorId product_creatorId, CreateTime product_createTime, ModifierId product_modifierId, ModifyTime product_modifyTime, IsDelete product_isDelete, Sort product_sort, ViewName product_viewName from PC_Product where Id=${id}

select Id product_id, BasicProductId product_basicProductId, SpvId product_spvId, CategoryId product_categoryId, AssetCategoryCode product_assetCategoryCode, Name product_name, Code product_code, TotalAmount product_totalAmount, SurplusAmount product_surplusAmount, FirstPublishTime product_firstPublishTime, UmpayAccountNo product_umpayAccountNo, Description product_description, Status product_status, DistributeStatus product_distributeStatus, CreatorId product_creatorId, CreateTime product_createTime, ModifierId product_modifierId, ModifyTime product_modifyTime, IsDelete product_isDelete, Sort product_sort, ViewName product_viewName from PC_Product order by Id asc limit ${start},${offset}
